title: Responsive Teaching Methodology Workshop for Elementary Engineering Design Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational pedagogy and engineering design concepts
context.additional_context: A preservice teacher training course focusing on methods to guide engineering problem-solving activities in actual elementary classrooms

learning_goals: Explain at least three responsive teaching strategies to promote elementary students' creative engineering design activities.
Practice analyzing and providing feedback on thinking patterns that emerge during students' design processes.
Design a blended learning model that includes literacy-based engineering projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
